name: UpdateSelfHostedRunnersInGroup
description:
Update self-hosted runners in an enterprise group.

This tool replaces the list of self-hosted runners in a specified enterprise runner group. It requires authentication with an access token having the `manage_runners:enterprise` scope.

parameters.name: enterprise_identifier
parameters.description: The slug version of the enterprise name or the enterprise ID.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

parameters.name: runner_group_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the self-hosted runner group. This integer ID specifies which group to update.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner group.

parameters.name: runner_ids_to_add
parameters.description: Array of runner IDs to be added to the specified runner group in the enterprise. Each runner ID should be an integer.

value_schema.description: List of runner IDs to add to the runner group.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: enterprise
parameters.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

parameters.name: runner_group_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner group.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner group.

parameters.name: runners
parameters.description: List of runner IDs to add to the runner group.

value_schema.description: List of runner IDs to add to the runner group.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
